title: Update to use python 2-3 compatible function tf_inspect.getfullargspec.
body_html:
RE: Issue #22413

The tf_inspect module is configured to shim python 2 for use with the tf_inspect.getfullargspec wrapper, making the function python 2-3 compatible.

The older tf_inspect.getargspec is used locally for _getfullargspec with python 2, and called for unit tests in tf_inspect_test.py, but it's also exposed for potential misuse without much documentation.

Several modules fall into the trap of calling the exposed tf_inspect.getargspec directly. Python 3 calls to any of these modules will call the deprecated python 2 function.

This PR changes the following:

  • Adds a warning to the tf_inspect.getargspec docstring recommending use of tf_inspect.getfullargspec instead.

  • Updates tf_inspect.getargspec calls in other modules to use tf_inspect.getfullargspec

  • Adds unit tests for tf_inspect.getfullargspec and tf_inspect.FullArgSpec

Several modules fall into the trap of calling the exposed tf_inspect.getargspec directly. Python 3 calls to any of these modules will call the deprecated python 2 function.
This PR changes the following:


Adds a warning to the tf_inspect.getargspec docstring recommending use of tf_inspect.getfullargspec instead.


Updates tf_inspect.getargspec calls in other modules to use tf_inspect.getfullargspec


Adds unit tests for tf_inspect.getfullargspec and tf_inspect.FullArgSpec
body:
RE: Issue #22413 

The `tf_inspect` module is configured to shim python 2 for use with the `tf_inspect.getfullargspec` wrapper, making the function python 2-3 compatible.

The older `tf_inspect.getargspec` is used locally for _getfullargspec with python 2, and called for unit tests in tf_inspect_test.py, but it's also exposed for potential misuse without much documentation. 

Several modules fall into the trap of calling the exposed `tf_inspect.getargspec` directly. Python 3 calls to any of these modules will call the deprecated python 2 function.

This PR changes the following:

- Adds a warning to the `tf_inspect.getargspec` docstring recommending use of `tf_inspect.getfullargspec` instead.

- Updates `tf_inspect.getargspec` calls in other modules to use `tf_inspect.getfullargspec`

- Adds unit tests for `tf_inspect.getfullargspec` and `tf_inspect.FullArgSpec`
